document_notes.text:
This update fixes the following security issue:

CVE-2015-5343: Possible remotely triggerable heap overflow and out-of-bounds read in mod_dav_svn caused 
by integer overflow when parsing skel-encoded request bodies. (bnc#958300)

notes.text: Integer overflow in util.c in mod_dav_svn in Apache Subversion 1.7.x, 1.8.x before 1.8.15, and 1.9.x before 1.9.3 allows remote authenticated users to cause a denial of service (subversion server crash or memory consumption) and possibly execute arbitrary code via a skel-encoded request body, which triggers an out-of-bounds read and heap-based buffer overflow.
